programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia. (cc)(c)

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia. (cc).

programme.desc: A food safari across Zimbabwe, Zambia and South Africa features adventurous recipes cooked by host Sarah Graham in the great outdoors. programme.title: English Premier League Soccer
programme.sub-title: Leicester City FC vs. Everton FC
programme.desc: Leicester City did the Premier League double against Everton last season, winning 3-1 at King Power Stadium in May after a 3-2 victory at Goodison Park in December. Of the 20 Premier League fixtures between the teams, 13 have finished in a draw.

programme.title: English Premier League Soccer
programme.sub-title: Swansea City AFC vs. West Ham United FC
programme.desc: Swansea is unbeaten in all four Premier League home matches against West Ham, although the last three have all been drawn. The Hammers had won their first two top flight visits to Swansea in the old Division One, including the 5-1 victory in 1983.

programme.title: English Premier League Soccer
programme.desc: Burnley and Middlesbrough are in the top flight together for the first time since 1975. That season the Clarets won 4-1 at home and drew 1-1 away, but still went on to be relegated after finishing 21st out of 22 teams. Boro ended the campaign 13th.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Playoff: The Barclays

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Playoff: Deutsche Bank Championship

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Playoff: BMW Championship
programme.desc: Final-round play in the BMW Championship in Carmel, Ind. Last year in Lake Forest, Ill., Jason Day led wire-to-wire to win this tourney by six shots over Daniel Berger. It was his fourth victory in his last six events. (cc)(n)

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Playoff: Tour Championship
programme.desc: Final-round play in the Tour Championship at East Lake Golf Club in Atlanta. Patrick Reed, Rory McIlroy and Dustin Johnson won the first three playoff events this year. Last year, Jordan Spieth won this tourney and also claimed the FedExCup title. (cc)(n)

programme.title: NFL Primetime
programme.desc: Highlights and in-depth analysis of National Football League action. Launched in 1987, the show was a popular lead-in to ESPN's Sunday-night NFL coverage for two decades before moving to Mondays in 2006. The original format delivered game clips, statistics and analysis at an unrelenting pace to sate the fervent fan base of the NFL. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Heart of Dallas Bowl: Army vs. North Texas
programme.desc: Army (7-5) vs. North Texas (5-7) at the Cotton Bowl. The Black Knights follow a breakthrough win over Navy with their second bowl game in 20 years, led by a power ground game and LB Andrew King. The Mean Green ran to a 35-18 win at West Point on Oct. 22 behind Jeffrey Wilson's 160 yards and 3 TDs. UNT looks to follow last season's bowl success (3-0) of teams awarded bowl berths with only five wins. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Military Bowl: Temple vs. Wake Forest
programme.desc: Temple (10-3) vs. Wake Forest (6-6) in Annapolis, Md. Temple all-time passer Phillip Walker (10,273 yards) faces Deacons DB Jessie Bates, who has 5 INTs for an ACC-best 158 return yards. The Owls eye their third bowl win, and Wake its first since 2008. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Holiday Bowl: Minnesota vs. Washington State
programme.desc: Minnesota (8-4) vs. Washington State (8-4) in San Diego. Gophers RB Rodney Smith (15 TDs) and all-time Pac-12 receptions leader Gabe Marks of WSU are key weapons for QBs Mitch Leidner and Luke Falk. Both teams are going for rare back-to-back bowl wins, with Minnesota accomplishing the feat from 2002-2004 while the Cougars have never won bowls in consecutive seasons. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Cactus Bowl: Boise State vs. Baylor
programme.desc: Boise State (10-2) vs. Baylor (6-6) in Phoenix. Junior RB Jeremy McNichols (23 TDs) leads the Broncos against a Baylor squad that's surrendered 43.6 ppg during its current six-game skid. Boise is 6-1 in bowls since 2009, with the Bears at 3-3 since 2010. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Pinstripe Bowl: Pittsburgh vs. Northwestern
programme.desc: Pittsburgh (8-4) vs. Northwestern (6-6) at Yankee Stadium. Big Ten receiving leader Austin Carr (1196 yards, 84 catches) leads the Wildcats against Pitt and Disney Spirit Award winner RB James Conner (1060 yards, 16 TDs). NU seeks its third-ever bowl win, while the Panthers have made nine straight bowls (3-5). (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Russell Athletic Bowl: West Virginia vs. Miami
programme.desc: West Virginia (10-2) vs. Miami (8-4) in Orlando. The Mountaineers feature RB Justin Crawford on offense and an aggressive defense led by CB Rasul Douglas (8 INTs). Miami, piloted by junior QB Brad Kaaya, looks to end a six-game losing streak in bowls. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Texas Bowl: Texas A&M vs. Kansas State
programme.desc: Texas A&M (8-4) vs. Kansas State (8-4) in Houston. The Aggies make their eighth straight bowl appearance, powered by RB Trayveon Williams and WR Josh Reynolds. K-State, featuring Big 12 sack leader Jordan Willis (11.5), is 1-5 in bowls since 2010. (live) (cc)(n)

The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Requiem for a Slut
programme.desc: The Gallaghers grapple with the loss of one of their own. As Lip takes steps to improve his future, Debbie, Carl and Liam get roped into Frank's new scheme. Meanwhile, Kev and V get their revenge on Svetlana. Season finale(n)

programme.title: Michael Jackson's Journey From Motown to Off the Wall
programme.desc: Director Spike Lee documents an in-depth look into the evolution of The King of Pop, Michael Jackson, and the cultural significance - and lasting impact - of his seminal first solo album as an adult, 'Off The Wall.'(n)

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer(n)

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Ben Stiller created and stars in this fashion industry spoof as IQ-challenged supermodel Derek Zoolander, a vain and sweetly stupid hunk who is brainwashed by evil designer Mugatu into becoming a top-secret assassin. Owen Wilson and Will Ferrell costar in this satirical comedy(n)

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars in this tale based on the true story of Alan Turing, a genius British mathematician, who works against the clock to crack Germany's infamously unbreakable codes during World War II and defies convention in his personal life. Also stars Keira Knightley(n)

programme.title: Michael Jackson's Journey From Motown to Off the Wall
programme.desc: Director Spike Lee documents an in-depth look into the evolution of The King of Pop, Michael Jackson, and the cultural significance - and lasting impact - of his seminal first solo album as an adult, 'Off The Wall.'(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis(n)

programme.title: Running For His Life: The Lawrence Phillips Story
programme.desc: Feature length documentary examining the troubled life and tragic death of college football standout and talented NFL running back Lawrence Phillips, whose scars of childhood abuse and abandonment haunted him throughout his career(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: Michael Jackson's Journey From Motown to Off the Wall
programme.desc: Director Spike Lee documents an in-depth look into the evolution of The King of Pop, Michael Jackson, and the cultural significance - and lasting impact - of his seminal first solo album as an adult, 'Off The Wall.'(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh(n)

programme.title: 3:10 To Yuma
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Christian Bale star in this blazing Western remake as, respectively, a daring outlaw and the humble farmer deputized to deliver him to justice. Peter Fonda, Gretchen Mol, Ben Foster and Alan Tudyk costar in this acclaimed frontier adventure(n)

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: In the 1870s Wild West, a peaceful American settler kills his family's murderer, which unleashes the fury of a notorious gang leader who is hell bent on hunting the settler down, in this blood spattered saga of sin and redemption. Stars Eva Green(n)

programme.title: Sicko
programme.desc: Documentary filmmaker Michael Moore, that lightning rod of sociopolitical controversy, continues his provocative cinematic crusade with this incendiary, highly critical examination of the greed fueling America's private enterprise health care system(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award� nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars in this ethereal drama based on the best-selling novel about a family of repressed teenaged girls in the 1970s who take drastic action to escape their restrictive home life. Danny DeVito, Josh Hartnett, Kathleen Turner and James Woods costar in the directorial debut of Sofia Coppola(n)

programme.title: Winter Passing
programme.desc: In this dramatic comedy, Zooey Deschanel stars as a struggling twenty-something actress who goes in search of her legendary, reclusive novelist father and must wrestle with his unconventional new family and their shared past. Also stars Ed Harris and Will Ferrell(n)

programme.title: Bless The Child
programme.desc: Psychiatric nurse Maggie O'Connell (Kim Basinger) fights her drug-addicted sister (Christina Ricci) and a Satanic cult leader (Rufus Sewell) for custody of her niece, a six-year-old girl who is the key to winning the battle between good and evil. Jimmy Smits costars in this supernatural thriller from the director of "The Mask."(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman(n)

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise(n)

programme.title: The Affair: 305
programme.desc: Alison is motivated to spend a memorable day with Noah on Block Island for an unusual reason. Noah is left wistful by their profound connection, until the problems from which he was escaping return with a shocking force(n)

programme.title: 2016 Week 16
programme.desc: Exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game, every week of the football season. Plus, hard-hitting commentary and expert analysis from host James Brown, Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets Brandon Marshall(n)

programme.title: Tony Roberts: Motorcity Motormouth
programme.desc: Detroit native Tony T. Roberts returns to his hometown for a raucous and occasionally musical night of stand up where no topic is off limits and anything can happen(n)

programme.title: 2016 Week 16
programme.desc: Exclusive NFL Films highlights of every game, every week of the football season. Plus, hard-hitting commentary and expert analysis from host James Brown, Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Michael Irvin and New York Jets Brandon Marshall(n)

programme.title: Casino Royale (2006)
programme.desc: The saga of James Bond, agent 007 of Her Majesty's Secret Service, is given a fresh injection of high-octane thrills with this reboot of the spy series starring Daniel Craig as a newly minted, wet-nosed "blunt instrument" assigned his first mission: take down the sinister La Chiffre, an international arms dealer selling dangerous weapons to terrorists. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims(n)

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar(n)

programme.title: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
programme.desc: Epic historical drama directed by Ridley Scott that revolves around Christopher Columbus' famed journey, from convincing the Spanish queen to finance his expedition to setting sail, quelling potential mutinies and a triumphant return home only to find that his dream of a peaceful new world clashes with a Spanish nobleman's visions of conquest. Stars Gerard Depardieu and Sigourney Weaver(n)

programme.title: Forsaken
programme.desc: Kiefer and Donald Sutherland share the screen in this brooding western about an embittered gunslinger who attempts to make amends with his estranged father whilst their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers(n)

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: In the Season 1 Premiere, CIA case officer Carrie Mathison becomes suspicious that war hero Nicholas Brody, a Marine Sergeant rescued after eight years of captivity in Afghanistan, has been turned into a sleeper agent by Al Qaeda(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Violence, Nudity

programme.title: Grace
programme.desc: Carrie receives a new piece of electronic evidence from an undercover agent while staying glued to the surveillance footage of life in Brody's home, which reveals a man struggling with his traumatic memories and resisting pressure to become a media hero(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Clean Skin
programme.desc: Despite misgivings, the Brody family prepares to step into the spotlight with an exclusive television interview; at the CIA, Carrie and her team close in on an Al Qaeda plot to fund a terrorist attack on the U.S(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Nudity

programme.title: Semper I
programme.desc: The political powers that be make big plans for national hero Brody, but his increasingly erratic behavior threatens his media darling status; Carrie grows desperate for evidence linking Brody with Abu Nazir, as Saul directs her to focus on Nazir's money trail(n)

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: Brody confronts the lone survivor among the insurgents that held him, leading Carrie to believe she may be proved right about Brody once and for all - but Brody's reunion with his captor surprises everyone; the agency is hot on the trail of the lovers who bought a house near the airport with funds from a stolen necklace(n)

programme.title: The Good Soldier
programme.desc: Reeling after losing key players in Nazir's plot against America, the CIA orders polygraphs on everyone who came in contact with them, including Brody, which Carrie sees as an opportunity to finally learn the truth(n)

programme.title: The Weekend
programme.desc: The relationship between Carrie and Brody becomes more complicated when they head into the countryside for the weekend, while Mike and Jessica face the fallout of the truth about their relationship, and Saul catches Aileen on the run to Mexico(n)

programme.title: Achilles Heel
programme.desc: As Carrie and Saul reel from the news that Walker is alive, the intelligence community clashes on the best way to capture him; Brody learns a shocking truth about his captivity(n)

programme.title: Crossfire
programme.desc: After his attempt to sever ties with Abu Nazir, Brody finds himself reliving his captivity and recommits to his mission; Carrie finds herself in the middle of a public relations nightmare on the heels of the mosque shooting(n)

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: In this Australian horror flick a young nurse begins work at an isolated psychiatric ward, and quickly becomes fascinated with a brain dead patient who is the subject of a mad scientist's cruel and unusual experiments. What starts as an innocent fascination quickly takes a sinister turn, as the patient begins to use his psychic powers to manipulate her every move(n)

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead

programme.title: Dreamscape
programme.desc: In this visually awe-inspiring sci-fi adventure, a psychic (Dennis Quaid) who uses his ESP abilities only for financial gain is hired to project himself into the dreams of scientific subjects as part of a groundbreaking clinical study. When he discovers a plot to assassinate the president of the United States, however, he must put aside his mercenary nature to literally save the world(n)

Jimmy Smits costars in this supernatural thriller from the director of "The Mask."(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. programme.title: The Conspirators
programme.desc: A member of the Dutch underground (Paul Henreid) plays a dangerous game with Nazis in Lisbon. Hedy Lamarr, Sydney Greenstreet, Peter Lorre, Victor Francen, Carol Thurston, Joseph Calleia, Steven Geray. Miguel: Vladimir Sokoloff. Almeida: Eduardo Ciannelli. Jean Negulesco score(c)

programme.title: The Woman in White

programme.desc: During World War II, Devil's Island escapees endeavor to fight for Free France(c)

programme.title: Background to Danger
programme.desc: An agent (George Raft) tries to hold documents that might sway Turkey to the Nazi cause. Brenda Marshall, Sydney Greenstreet, Peter Lorre. Ana: Osa Massen. Directed by Raoul Walsh(c)

programme.title: Casablanca
programme.desc: Romance, World War II intrigue, a heroic American expatriate, a brave Czech freedom fighter, arrogant Nazis, patriotic Frenchmen, blackmail, black-marketeers and the usual suspects make this Best Picture even more an audience favorite as time goes by. Director Michael Curtiz scored an Oscar, as did the script. (cc)(c)

programme.title: The Maltese Falcon
programme.desc: A hard-boiled San Francisco private eye is hired to track down a stolen artifact, a priceless, jewel-laden statuette of a black bird, and his investigation leads him to become embroiled in a series of crosses and double-crosses that lead back to his recently murdered partner. A Best Picture nominee that features an Oscar-nominated screenplay written by the film's director, John Huston, who adapted Dashiell Hammett's classic detective novel. (cc)(c)

programme.title: Arsenic and Old Lace
programme.desc: Macabre comedy about a pair of sweet old ladies from Brooklyn who put lonely bachelors out of their misery with sips from their arsenic-laced elderberry wine---"acts of mercy" that their visiting nephew finds hard to swallow. The film is based on Joseph Kesselring's Broadway play, a long-running hit that contractually delayed release of the picture almost three years (cc)(c)

programme.title: Grey Gardens
programme.desc: The Maysles brothers' portrait of Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis' aunt and cousin, Edith Bouvier Beale and daughter Edie, former socialites who have become recluses in a deteriorating home in East Hampton, N.Y(c)

programme.title: The Whales of August

programme.title: Travels With My Aunt
programme.desc: An adaptation of Graham Greene's novel chronicles the escapades of a free-spirited, eccentric Auntie Mamelike dowager (Best Actress nominee Maggie Smith) who takes her bookish bachelor nephew under her wing, involving him in old love affairs, espionage, kidnappings and more(c)

programme.title: Bunny O'Hare
programme.desc: Bette Davis and Ernest Borgnine play aging bank robbers disguised as hippies in this farce. Greely: Jack Cassidy. R.J.: Joan Delaney. Rupert: Jay Robinson. Ad: John Astin. Lulu: Reva Rose. Location scenes were filmed in New Mexico. Directed by Gerd Oswald(c)

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: Orson Welles' follow-up to "Citizen Kane" is this Best Picture nominee, an epic tale of the gradual decline of an old-monied Indianapolis family in the face of turn-of-the-century industrialization. The Ambersons' magnificent lives are apparent as the film opens, as is their sense of propriety. Welles, who directed, produced and adapted the screenplay from Booth Tarkington's novel, also provides the narration. Remade as a 2002 made-for-cable film. (cc)(c)

programme.title: On Dangerous Ground
programme.desc: A hardened police officer agrees to help the sister of a killer when she realizes the victim's father hopes to get revenge by murdering the perpetrator, who is deeply mentally ill(c)

programme.title: The Road Builder
programme.desc: A woman finds her rural isolation unsettled by a mysterious drifter with a deadly secret(c)

programme.title: The Wrong Man

The idea for the motion picture came when Hitchcock read about the miscarriage of justice in a Life magazine article(c)

programme.title: The Naked and the Dead
